alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Knox; Morrow; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 5:59PM EDT until March 23 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Richland County in north central Ohio... Southern Ashland County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Morrow County in north central Ohio... Central Knox County in north central Ohio... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Centerburg, or 14 miles southwest of Mount Vernon, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Mount Vernon, Loudonville, Fredericktown, Bellville, Centerburg, Chesterville, Sparta, Waterford, Butler, Perrysville, Lucas, Mifflin and North Liberty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio.
